item.title: Tricky Javascript Interview Questions
item.description: This post is a collection of tricky interview questions based on different concepts in JavaScript. The difficulty level of question will increase as you read forward down the line in this post.

item.title: Top Javascript Interview Questions
item.description: These Javascript interview questions are based on my personal interview experience. Likelihood of question being asked in the interview is from top to bottom.
